title: Rassegnina del 30 nov 2023
text:
Leggere

Fernando del Pino Calvo-Sotelo - blog post che rilegge criticamente la Laudate Deum o nuovo dogma climatico



Guardare
…


Ascoltare

“UnHerd” Podcast Episode on 🎙Busting the Bill Gates myth “Through the Gates Foundation Bill Gates is not donating money as much as he is buying policy influence”. Investigative journalist Tim Schwab challenges the mith of the good philanthropist billionaire: do their foundations sustain good public goals set by (elected) public officials or unduly influence the destination of taxpayer money by way of their outsized leverage on international and supranational organizations (e.g. Gavi Alliance - WHO - big pharma)?



Ricordare

Marcello Foa - “Il sistema Invisibile”


(V. Volkoff in “Le montage” 1982) Quando si parla di mobilitare le masse, in realtà non si ha che uno scopo: immobilizzarle.

title: README
text:
Rassegna stampa website
MADE WITH QUARTO


Notes

✅ Per creare un nuovo post ho salvato una funzione apposta in _R/new_post.R creata e condivisa da Tom Mock 🙌
